text: @realDonaldTrump Can anyone believe that  your response to the Coronavirus could be any worse? It's spreading like wildfire and you're up on stage with the maturity level of an 8 year old calling it "Kung Flu". It's not one of your wives, you can't pay it to go away.  Wake up, idiot.
